trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryPartition" /> class is an abstract class that represents a directory partition in a domain.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryPartition" /> 類別為抽象類別，表示網域中的目錄磁碟分割。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryPartition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryPartition" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources that are held by the object.
trans-unit.target: 釋放該物件所持有的資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases all managed and unmanaged resources that are held by the object.
trans-unit.target: 釋放此物件所持有的所有 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that determines if the managed resources should be released.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，可決定是否應該釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the managed resources are released; <see langword="false" /> if only the unmanaged resources are released.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 資源，若只釋放 Unmanaged 資源則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the managed resources that are used by the object and, optionally, releases unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放此物件所使用的 Managed 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: The `disposing` parameter only affects the release of the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: `disposing`參數只會影響受管理資源的版本。

trans-unit.source: The unmanaged resources are always released by this method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法一律會釋出 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object that represents the directory partition.
trans-unit.target: 擷取表示目錄磁碟分割的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object that represents the directory partition.
trans-unit.target: 傳回表示目錄磁碟分割的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the partition name.
trans-unit.target: 包含此磁碟分割名稱的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a string representation of the current directory partition.
trans-unit.target: 擷取目前的目錄磁碟分割之字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the current directory partition.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前的目錄磁碟分割之字串表示。
